Name: KYC Rejected
Subject: We couldn’t verify your ID
HtmlBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thanks for uploading your documents. Our ID check partner wasn’t able to verify them this time.

It could be something simple — like a blurry photo, expired ID, or a detail that didn’t quite match.

No worries — you can re-upload a clearer set of documents in just a few steps:

Try again here:
Re-submit my documents

If you’re stuck or have any questions, just hit reply — we’re happy to help.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
TextBody:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thanks for uploading your documents. Our ID check partner wasn’t able to verify them this time.

It could be something simple — like a blurry photo, expired ID, or a detail that didn’t quite match.

No worries — you can re-upload a clearer set of documents in just a few steps:

Try again here: {{kyc_link}}

If you’re stuck or have any questions, just hit reply — we’re happy to help.

— The VirtualAddressHub Team
